title: How AI Agents Are Starting To Automate the Enterprise
author: Richard MacManus
description: AI Agents that browse the web and take actions on your behalf are emerging (see OpenAI Operator). Now Orby brings agents to enterprise IT.
cntitle: AI Agent 如何开始自动化企业
cndescription: 能够浏览网页并代表您执行操作的 AI Agent 正在涌现（参见 OpenAI Operator）。现在，Orby 将 agent 带到了企业 IT 领域。
